channel.title: Shape recognition on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Shape recognition on open-archaeo

item.title: ancient-artifacts
item.description: Dynamic image analysis to identify ancient artifacts in soil samples.

item.title: ArchAIDE
item.description: Tool for the automatic recognition of archaeological pottery.

item.title: Arothron
item.description: Tools of Virtual Anthropology to build virtual cavities as endocasts, to align two disarticulated models belonging to the same specimen, and functions to import and export format files into another format.

item.title: artefact-morpho.R
item.description: R code for converting B&W jpgs of artefact silhouettes to matrices and computing basic Elliptical Fourier statistics, including PCA and MANOVA.

item.title: CeraMatch
item.description: Visual shape-matching of ceramics profiles.

item.title: ceramic-computation
item.description: R scripts for digitizing, processing, analyzing, and comparing archaeological ceramic 2d profile drawings, photographs, and other data.

item.title: charcoalhearths
item.description: Work with geotifs to detect charcoal hearths

item.title: CSGR
item.description: Extracts and calculates from long bone cross sections, cortical thickness maps, and biomechanically pertinent cross-sectional geometric properties.

item.title: CuneiPainter
item.description: An App to recognize cuneiform characters on your Android phone.

item.title: DACORD
item.description: Computer-Assisted Drawing of Archaeological Pottery.

item.title: grainsizeR
item.description: This package contains all the tools necessary to extract grain sizes from images, digitally sieve grain size measurements, and gather descriptive statistics on sieved data.

item.title: Iraq_mortar
item.description: Enables the creation of a high quality 3D model of an archaeological artefact via process known as photo-masking.

item.title: ithaca
item.description: Restoring and attributing ancient texts using deep neural networks.

item.title: morphotype
item.description: Provide a pipeline from shape data extraction to typological arrangement of pottery profiles.

item.title: morphotypeShiny
item.description: Shiny implementation of morphotype.

item.title: murature
item.description: This Python library was written as an help for the study of stone walls, mainly through the quantitative analysis of spatial dimensions of stones.

item.title: postAAR
item.description: An automated process to detect buildings within large sets of postholes in multi-occupational sites, similar to the obsolete Windows-software “posthole” by Irwin Scollar.

item.title: postAAR-python
item.description: Python implementation of postAAR.

item.title: RACORD
item.description: Computer-Assisted Shape Classification of Archaeological Pottery Fragments.

item.title: rock-art-radnet
item.description: Rock art object detection model.

item.title: rock-art-ratopoviz
item.description: Create visualizations from laserscans.

item.title: rock-art-transfer-learning
item.description: Reconstructing rock art chronology with transfer learning

item.title: SediNet
item.description: Deep learning framework for optical granulometry (estimation of sedimentological variables from sediment imagery).

item.title: segmenteverygrain
item.description: A SAM-based model for instance segmentation of images of grains.

item.title: SexEst
item.description: Uses machine learning models to predict the Sex of unknown skeletons based on their cranial and postcranial measurements.

item.title: shapAAR
item.description: This is an R package for the extraction, analysis and classification of (not only) archaeological objects derived from scanned images. Especially it aims at the analysis of the shapes/profiles of eg. ceramic vessels or arrow heads.

item.title: signboardr
item.description: Extract text from archaeological photos containing a sign board and tag as metadata.

item.title: synthkat
item.description: Synthetic Categories for Archaeological Vessel Comparison.
